result.execSummary:
The defendant Ryan Alberto Cruz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property-Special Facts [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.

miscConds.notes: Work out payment plan with agent.
Work out payment plan with agent.
Obtain or maintain full time employment or part time employment if enrolled in school.

May not vote or serve on a jury until civil rights are restored.
No firearms.
Provide DNA sample on 2-16-16
Pay DNA surcharge.

No alcohol or controlled subtances without a prescription and as approved by agent.
No contact with co-defendants, N.E. or R.W. or their immediate families.
No contact with victim, S.J., his immediate family or residence.

Court will hold expungement open.
Defendant may petition Court upon succcessful completion of probation (no probation revocation, pay all costs and restitution, no new crimes - as verfified by D.A.)
Follow through with counseling assessments and recommended treatment.

timeConds.notes:
No credit.
No good time.
Huber release if in compliance with the jail rules and regulations.
